sourcesContent:
import '../styles/ProjectCard.css'; export default function ProjectCard({ darkMode }) { const projects = [ { image: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6c/Star_Wars_Logo.svg/800px-Star_Wars_Logo.svg.png", title: "Music App", description: "Play, create playlists, like songs and discover music trends.", techIcons: "https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=nextjs,react,ts,tailwind,redis", liveLink: "https://music-app.vercel.app", codeLink: "https://github.com/usuario/music-app" }, { image: "https://film-fanatic-eta.vercel.app/assets/banner.jpeg", title: "Film Fanatic", description: "A responsive movie app to search and view details of your favorite films.", techIcons: "https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=react,js,html,css", liveLink: "https://film-fanatic-eta.vercel.app", codeLink: "https://github.com/poncho-ajmv/FilmFanatic" }, { image: "https://analizador-lexico-web.vercel.app/logo192.png", title: "Analizador Léxico", description: "An online lexical analyzer built with React for educational purposes.", techIcons: "https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=react,js,html,css", liveLink: "https://analizador-lexico-web.vercel.app/", codeLink: "https://github.com/poncho-ajmv/analizador-lexico-web" }, { image: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/poncho-ajmv/Metaheurisitcas_With_Python/main/metaheuristics.png", title: "Metaheurísticas Python", description: "Implementación de algoritmos metaheurísticos clásicos como búsqueda local y recocido simulado.", techIcons: "https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=python,jupyter", liveLink: null, codeLink: "https://github.com/poncho-ajmv/Metaheurisitcas_With_Python" }, { image: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/poncho-ajmv/EvaluadorExpresionesGUI/main/preview.png", title: "Evaluador de Expresiones GUI", description: "Evaluador de expresiones matemáticas infijas en una interfaz gráfica simple con Java.", techIcons: "https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=java", liveLink: null, codeLink: "https://github.com/poncho-ajmv/EvaluadorExpresionesGUI" } ]; return (
{projects.map((project, index) => (

{project.title}

{project.description}

Code {project.liveLink && ( Live )}
))}
); }
